titleStmt.title: A defence of the liturgie of the Church of England, or, Booke of common prayer In a dialogue betweene Nouatus and Irenæus. By Ambrose Fisher, sometimes of Trinitie Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Ambrose, d. 1617.
Grant, John, fl. 1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W[illiam] S[tansby] for Robert Milbourne in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Greyhound
